mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_privilege (STRPRIVILEGEID, STRPRIVILEGENAME, STRPRIVILEGEDESC, STRPRIVILEGEURL, STRPARENTID, STRINSERTTIME) VALUS (#{strPrivilegeid}, #{strPrivilegename}, #{strPrivilegedesc}, #{strPrivilegeurl}, #{strParentid}, #{strInserttime})
mapper.select: SELECT STRPRIVILEGEID AS strPrivilegeid, STRPRIVILEGENAME AS strPrivilegename, STRPRIVILEGEDESC AS strPrivilegedesc, STRPRIVILEGEURL AS strPrivilegeurl, STRPARENTID AS strParentid, STRINSERTTIME AS strInserttime, STRUPDATETIME AS strUpdatetime FROM tb_privilege WHERE STRPRIVILEGEID=#{strPrivilegeid}

SELECT STRPRIVILEGEID AS strPrivilegeid, STRPRIVILEGENAME AS strPrivilegename, STRPRIVILEGEDESC AS strPrivilegedesc, STRPRIVILEGEURL AS strPrivilegeurl, STRPARENTID AS strParentid, STRINSERTTIME AS strInserttime, STRUPDATETIME AS strUpdatetime FROM tb_privilege ORDER BY STRINSERTTIME DESC
